DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate procedural clinical benefit patient specific pre-procedure rehearsal operator various experience level tool optimize Endovascular Aneurysm Repair ( EVAR ) procedure .
DOC.brief_title: Patient-Specific Simulation Used EVAR Procedure Rehearsal - Evaluation Clinical Performance With Without Prior Rehearsal
DOC.criteria: 1 . At least 18 year old 2 . Elective patient plan undergo EVAR procedure endograft compatible Simbionix PRS . 3 . Computed Tomography Angiography ( CTA ) scan abdominal aorta perform standard care . Sufficient quality/defined protocol . 1 . Subject 18 year old 2 . Operator complete indicate rehearsal practice . 3 . Patients require emergent aneurysm treatment , e.g . trauma rupture . 4 . Arterial dissection . 5 . Patients Stage 4 chronic kidney disease ( GFR < 30 ml/min/m2 ) . 6 . Patient indicate use snorkel , chimney , fenestrated branch graft device 7 . Pregnant lactating woman . 8 . Off label stent graft use
